attributes.action: remove the €47.07 per tonne anti-dumping duty on imported Ammonium Nitrate fertiliser
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The anti dumping duty on imports of Russian AN currently stands at €47.07 per tonne. This is in addition to the 6.5% duty charged. With global fertiliser prices at high levels, there is no need to continue with this anti competitive duty, making imported fertiliser, of equal quality and consistancy as that produced locally, unavailable to the British farmer.
